full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: Mark Epstein DATE TIME A.M. P.M. M OF Karen PHONE/MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE she SAID TAMIKA is not available tomorrow at 4:30 but Vivian is available SIGNED 1184 IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: SARAH DATE TIME 5:20 A.M. P.M. M OF Patrick PHONE/MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE to confirm and he was to the Dark Store or if he is developing me further. M OF PHONE/MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE SIGNED 1184 IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: Mark Eistein DATE TIME A.M. P.M. M OF Darina PHONE/MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE Asking if she can be picked up by Kristoffi SIGNED 1184 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00032472

text_blocks.content: she SAID TAMIKA is not available tomorrow at 4:30 but Vivian is available
to confirm and he was to the Dark Store or if he is developing me further.
Asking if she can be picked up by Kristoffi

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a notepad containing four 'Important Message' forms. The forms are filled with handwritten notes, and some of the writing is difficult to decipher. The document is dated 07/26/17 and has a public records request number of 17-295.
